Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.model.GameEntity
      • main.model.Item

  • @Entity
public class Item
extends GameEntity
    The items contained in the world the player is allowed to take and use

      • useWithItem

        public Item useWithItem(Item item)
        Checks if 2 items match when used with each other and returns a resulting item in that case
        Parameters:
        item - The item this.item is used with
        Returns:
        The item that is returned if one used 2 matching items in the proper order
